title: Pheonix Quinn skin makes my ms jump up?
body: Does anyone else have this problem phoenix quinn :/ and would I be able to get a refund since it's kinda ruining the game to use?

replies.body: I tried turning all of the graphics settings down including character graphics and partical effects and I've tried repairing files but my ping still ends up around 600 and it's only when I use phoenix quinn :/ it kinda really sucks that I bought this and I cant even play the game with it

That sounds like a really strange issue, graphics issues shouldn't cause connection issues.  You could run into fps problems, though, if some game data is failing to render properly.  Try out our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to repair any bad files.  If a refund is something you really want to look into, each account has[ 3 refund tokens](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ) to help!  I hope that helps!
I'll look into it but I already wasted the 3 tokens when I first got league. Thank you though
Who hadn't waste those refund tokens yet?  Lol
